title: Pavel Ryaboshapka
text:
Pavel Viktorovich Ryaboshapka (; born 25 November 1983) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played 5 seasons in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Neftekhimik%20Nizhnekamsk">FC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk</a> and <a href="FC%20SKA-Energiya%20Khabarovsk">FC SKA-Energiya Khabarovsk</a>.
